title: Danshi Koukouseiteki Kazoku Keikaku!
description:
Description :
        Hino-kun is good-looking and a rumored delinquent. Actually, he is a kind-hearted high school student who looks after his young nephew. He can see that Mizusawa-kun is good at making sweets so for the sake of his fatherless nephew, he asks him to, â€œPlease marry my older sister!â€ But instead, he receives a reverse proposal from Mizusawa saying, â€œI want to marry you.â€â€¦?!
